item.description: If you want to know more about "E6" check out this link: http://forum.rpg.net/showthread.php?t=352719 The E6 league starts up this weekend. One of the benefits of this is that no one needs to show up every week. Come when you can. With such short story arcs the games become episodic in nature making it feel more like popular books, movies and tv shows.
item.why: Every Sunday 4:30-9. All are welcome. Please make a 6th level Pathfinder character with 32 point buy. We'll do a rotating DM system. All are encouraged to run a 1 or 2 night adventure and we'll keep swapping out.
item.name: Pathfinder E6 League
